articles.title: Zendaya Says Her ‘Agency Was Stripped Away’ by Backlash Over ‘Malcolm & Marie’ White Director - IndieWire
articles.description: "John David, I, and Sam equally own this film," Zendaya says. "It’s not like it belongs to someone else and I just got cast in it."

articles.title: Fox News Absolutely Freaks Out Over Disney+ 'Muppets' Disclaimer - Daily Beast
